heading: HB02568
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE BUREAU OF IMMIGRATION TO IMPLEMENT A STATE-OF-THE-ART METHOD OF DOCUMENTING PERSONS WITH HOLD-DEPARTURE ORDERS AND IDENTITY CLEARANCE SO AS TO AVOID GREAT INCONVENIENCE ON THE PART OF THE NAMESAKES OF SUCH PERSONS WHO ARE THE SUBJECT OF SUCH HOLD-DEPARTURE ORDERS
